get.description: Retrieve a user by their unique identifier within an organization.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the organization

parameters.name: targetUserId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user to retrieve

default.description: Successful response with user details

get.description: Retrieve employees users within an organization.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the organization

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order of the results

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Field to order the results by

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter results

default.description: Successful response with user details

get.description: Retrieve an organization by its unique slug.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The unique slug of the organization

default.description: Successful response with organization details

post.description: Create a new service within an organization.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the organization

default.description: Successful response with created service details

get.description: Retrieve all services within an organization.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order of the results (asc or desc)

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Field to order the results by

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter services by name

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the organization

default.description: Successful response with all services details

delete.description: Delete a service within an organization.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the organization

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the service to be deleted

default.description: Successful response with deleted service details

put.description: Update the details of a service within an organization.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the organization

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the service

default.description: Successful response with updated service details

patch.description: Toggle the active status of a service within an organization.

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the organization

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the service

default.description: Successful response with toggled service status details
